column1: Local Foods////That's not to say all's bad. The prices are reasonable for the large portions
column4: if not the taste. 10-12 bucks gets you a nice sized sandwich and two fist-sized sides. If you want to see and be seen
column5: this is the place for you since the atmosphere is trendy and the place is bustling. Plus
column7: so anything that takes some business away from Jason's Deli
column9: and the rest of those joints is a good thing in my mind.
